summary: This document appears to be a deposit account opening application for Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas. It outlines various account types, customer identification policies, and terms and conditions for account holders. The document emphasizes compliance with anti-money laundering regulations and the responsibilities of account holders.
keyFacts: The document is a deposit account opening application for Deutsche Bank Trust Company Americas.
It includes various account types such as checking accounts, money market accounts, and certificates of deposit.
The application emphasizes the importance of customer identification to combat money laundering and terrorism financing.
Account holders are required to notify the bank of any changes to their personal or institutional information.
There are specific terms and conditions regarding joint accounts and the handling of funds after the death of an account owner.
